definition: History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
